channel.title: -SabiaScape- Beta testing today
channel.description:
Added PvP, With ancients all spells in ancients working correctly, 100% PvP with Modern Spells all working, Range fully working with dark bow, crystal bow, magic shortbow as also with any other shortbow and long bow. Melee with all special attacks fully working.
100/100
Big Picture: [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/x23u3c.jpg[/img] Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7aCLoFh_M8Y - please comment in all my vids.
Magic
Modern Magic
100/ 100
Pic: [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/21afrzp.jpg[/img]
Vid: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JLGHGSOFM18&feature=player_profilepage
Npc Combat
100/100 With - Perfect Timers, Npc's Follow, Npc's go back to their normal spot if you run away, UPDATE: No More NPC Clipping Pics: [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/a0ewj7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/333g7ck.jpg[/img]
Vid: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EPsw3eq1alM&feature=player_profilepage
Range 100/ 100 - With throwing knives, perfect spec's, perfect projectiles, npc's fight back. Pics: [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/2rrnd4w.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/i53dau.jpg[/img]
Vid: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nkphe9rkqwY
Skills
Almost all skills
Prayer
Pic: [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/hwi9tf.jpg[/img]
Vid: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L0fT3hu64Tc
NOTE: The video is still being processed. Video quality may improve once processing is complete.
Update Blog
-September 29, Got the source -September 30, Added 100% Melee, Npc's following, Npc's fighting back -October 1, Added 100% Range, Npc's following, Npc's fighting back, Npc's don't clip no more -October 2, Added 100% Mage, Npc's following, Npc's fighting back, Npc's don't clip no more, all god spells work as the charge. And Telekenetic Grab work perfect, also the high alchemy, low alchemny. -October 2, Added 100% Prayer, With Chivalry, and Piety. much more havent been posting them server has updated alot!!
